Package org.apache.logging.log4j.plugins.di

Class DI.UnscopedBindingBuilder<T>

java.lang.Object
org.apache.logging.log4j.plugins.di.DI.UnscopedBindingBuilder<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of binding result being registered
Direct Known Subclasses:
DI.ScopedBindingBuilder
Enclosing class:
DI
public static class DI.UnscopedBindingBuilder<T> extends Object
Builder DSL for configuring a binding to be registered with a ConfigurableInstanceFactory.

  • Method Details

    • inScope

      public DI.ScopedBindingBuilder<T> inScope(Class<? extends Annotation> scopeType)
      Continues defining a binding in a particular scope.
      Parameters:
      scopeType - annotation of the scope to use for this binding
      Returns:
      builder DSL to specify the scoped binding

    • toInstance

      public DI.FactoryBuilder toInstance(T instance)
      Adds the given instance as a binding to the configured key.
      Parameters:
      instance - instance to bind to the key
      Returns:
      builder DSL for ConfigurableInstanceFactory

    • toSingleton

      public DI.FactoryBuilder toSingleton(Supplier<? extends T> provider)
      Adds a singleton binding for the given supplier function.
      Parameters:
      provider - function for creating the initial binding value
      Returns:
      builder DSL for ConfigurableInstanceFactory

    • toUnscoped

      public DI.FactoryBuilder toUnscoped(Supplier<? extends T> provider)
      Adds an unscoped binding for the given supplier function. This function will be invoked every time an instance of this binding is requested.
      Parameters:
      provider - unscoped function for creating the binding value
      Returns:
      builder DSL for ConfigurableInstanceFactory

    • toFunction

      public DI.FactoryBuilder toFunction(Function<InstanceFactory,? extends Supplier<? extends T>> function)
      Adds a binding using a function that depends on InstanceFactory. This is useful for registering dependent bindings or more complex bindings in general.
      Parameters:
      function - unscoped function for creating the binding value from an InstanceFactory
      Returns:
      builder DSL for ConfigurableInstanceFactory
